document.full_text: japan has asked the united states for additional equipment to help provide water and other resources to keep quake-damaged nuclear reactors cool, the head of the u.s. nuclear regulatory commission said on monday.
document.title: u.s. says japan asked for equipment to cool reactors
lines_and_colors: japan has asked the united states for additional equipment to help provide water and other resources to keep quake-damaged nuclear reactors cool, the head of the u.s. nuclear regulatory commission said on monday.
